subject: Baseball
Yankee Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: In the 10-1 exhibition mauling of the Chicago Cubs on Saturday, Derek Jeter joked that he had to tell Mark Teixeira to save the moonshots until the games counted.
snippet: In the 10-1 exhibition mauling of the Chicago Cubs on Saturday, Derek Jeter joked that he had to tell Mark Teixeira to save the moonshots until the games counted.
